description:
As a user
  I want to complete the checkout process
  So that I can purchase items securely

steps.name: I am logged in as a standard user
I have added the backpack to my cart
I am on the cart page
I proceed to checkout
I should see the checkout information page
I fill in my information
I continue to the overview page
I should see the checkout overview page
the order summary should be displayed
the order summary should contain the backpack
the total label should be visible
I finish the order
I should see the complete page
the complete text should contain "Your order has been dispatched"
I return to products
I should be on the products page
the cart badge should show "0" items

elements.name: Validate required fields in checkout form

steps.name: I am logged in as a standard user
I have added the backpack to my cart
I am on the cart page
I proceed to checkout
I should see the checkout information page
I fill information without first name
I continue to the overview page
I should see an error message for missing first name
I fill information without last name
I continue to the overview page
I should see an error message for missing last name
I fill information without postal code
I continue to the overview page
I should see an error message for missing postal code
I am logged in as a standard user
I have added the backpack to my cart
I am on the cart page
I proceed to checkout
I should see the checkout information page
I cancel the checkout
I should be on the cart page
the cart should contain the backpack
the cart badge should show "1" item

elements.name: Display correct order summary on overview page

steps.name: I am logged in as a standard user
I have added the backpack to my cart
I am on the cart page
I proceed to checkout
I fill in my information
I continue to the overview page
I should see the checkout overview page
the cart should contain the backpack
the cart should display the backpack price
the item total label should be visible
the tax label should be visible
the total label should be visible
the payment information should show "SauceCard"
the shipping information should show "Free Pony Express Delivery"
I am logged in as a standard user
I have added the backpack to my cart
I am on the cart page
I have added multiple items to my cart
I proceed to checkout
I fill in my information
I continue to the overview page
I should see both items in the summary
I finish the order
I should see the complete page

name: Checkout Process

description:
As a user
  I want to authenticate with the system
  So that I can access my account and perform secure transactions

steps.name: I am on the login page
I login with valid credentials
I should be redirected to the products page
the shopping cart link should be visible
the burger menu button should be visible

elements.name: Show error message for invalid credentials

steps.name: I am on the login page
I login with invalid credentials
I should see an error message for invalid credentials
I should remain on the login page

elements.name: Show error message for locked out user

steps.name: I am on the login page
I login with locked out user credentials
I should see an error message for locked out user
I should remain on the login page
I am on the login page
I login with empty username
I should see an error message for missing username
I should remain on the login page
I am on the login page
I login with empty password
I should see an error message for missing password
I should remain on the login page

name: User Authentication

description:
As a user
  I want to manage items in my shopping cart
  So that I can review and modify my selections before checkout

steps.name: I am logged in as a standard user
I am on the products page
I add the backpack to my cart
the cart badge should show "1" item
the remove button for backpack should be visible
the remove button should display "Remove"
I am logged in as a standard user
I am on the products page
I have added the backpack to my cart
I navigate to the cart page
I should see the cart page
the cart should contain the backpack
the cart should display the backpack price
the checkout button should be visible
the continue shopping button should be visible
I am logged in as a standard user
I am on the products page
I have added the backpack to my cart
I am on the cart page
I remove the backpack from my cart
the cart should be empty
the cart badge should show "0" items
I am logged in as a standard user
I am on the products page
I have added the backpack to my cart
I am on the cart page
I click continue shopping
I should be redirected to the products page
the cart badge should show "1" item
I am logged in as a standard user
I am on the products page
I add the backpack to my cart
I add the bike light to my cart
the cart badge should show "2" items
the remove button for backpack should be visible
the remove button for bike light should be visible

name: Shopping Cart Functionality
